sentences.en: A crystal is cut from quartz.
A glass or quartz tube has tungsten electrodes sealed in each end.
sentences.cn: 两根钨丝电极是封在玻璃管或石英管的两端.

sentences.en: At first glance, calcite might be confused with quartz where both are clear, colorless, and " glassy ".
sentences.cn: 乍一看来, 方解石可能与石英相混淆,因为两者都是透明 、 无色 、 且 “ 呈玻璃状 ” 的.

sentences.en: At Flat the host is quartz diorite with a finegrained contact phase.
sentences.cn: 在富来梯,主岩为细粒接触相的石英闪长岩.

sentences.en: Clay coats can be particularly important as inhibitors of later quartz cementation.
sentences.cn: 粘土包壳作为石英晚期胶结作用的抑制剂可能是特别重要的.

sentences.en: It looks like quartz crystals sticking up out of the dark hollow.
sentences.cn: 它象石英晶体,在黑色的空间耸立着.

sentences.en: Quartz timepieces are very accurate, to a minute or two per year.
sentences.cn: 石英钟表走时非常准，年误差仅为一两分钟。

sentences.en: Rock faces commonly show a stockwork of intersecting quartz and carbonate veins.
sentences.cn: 岩石的外表呈现交织的石英及碳酸盐细脉组成的网格构造.

sentences.en: The material for the threads is spider web or quartz fibers.
sentences.cn: 丝的材料可以用蛛丝或石英丝.

sentences.en: The prospectors have discovered such minerals as calcite, quartz and asbestos here.
sentences.cn: 探矿人员在这里发现了方解石 、 石英、石棉等矿藏.

sentences.en: The quartz watch keeps good time.
The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz.
sentences.cn: 辐射光源或用硼硅酸盐玻璃或用石英过滤.

sentences.en: There is a great deal quartz in those mountains.
sentences.cn: 那些山里蕴藏着大量石英.

sentences.en: To this class of substance belong mica, porcelain, quartz, glass, wood, etc.
sentences.cn: 属于这类物质的有云母 、 瓷器 、 石英 、 玻璃 、 木材等等.

sentences.en: Well - sorted quartz sandstones are generally not very abundant.
sentences.cn: 分选良好的石英沙岩一般并不十分丰富.

trans.tran_en: a hard mineral substance that is used in making electronic watches and clocks
